name: Nooch II: Revenge of Remy
overview: Some time has passed since Umechiyo helped the genius girl Piliru to uncover the conspiracy in her homeland Paru. Now Piliru is about to attend a prestigious university in Japan. However, Remy, the leader of the Gilbert organization, will not give up so easily. She enlists the help of a foreign nation and concocts a devious plan. In addition, the relationship between the two heroes doesn't progress well. Umechiyo must find a way to stop Remy and restore peace and order. Nooch II: Revenge of Remy is a sequel to Nooch: Abakareta Inbō. Gameplay-wise, it is very similar to its predecessor. The player visits various locations by selecting them from a menu, talks to people about various topics, unlocks new information and new locations, and thus advances the story. All the interaction is performed through verb-object menu commands.
